IntegrationRuntime.description: Azure Data Factory nested object which serves as a compute resource for activities.

ManagedIntegrationRuntime.description: Managed integration runtime, including managed elastic and managed dedicated integration runtimes.

state.description: Integration runtime state, only valid for managed dedicated integration runtime.

computeProperties.description: The compute resource for managed integration runtime.

ssisProperties.description: SSIS properties for managed integration runtime.

IntegrationRuntimeComputeProperties.description: The compute resource properties for managed integration runtime.

location.description: The location for managed integration runtime. The supported regions could be found on https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/data-factory-data-movement-activities

nodeSize.description: The node size requirement to managed integration runtime.

numberOfNodes.description: The required number of nodes for managed integration runtime.

maxParallelExecutionsPerNode.description: Maximum parallel executions count per node for managed integration runtime.

vNetProperties.description: VNet properties for managed integration runtime.

IntegrationRuntimeVNetProperties.description: VNet properties for managed integration runtime.

vNetId.description: The ID of the VNet that this integration runtime will join.

subnet.description: The name of the subnet this integration runtime will join.

IntegrationRuntimeSsisProperties.description: SSIS properties for managed integration runtime.

catalogInfo.description: Catalog information for managed dedicated integration runtime.

licenseType.description: License type for bringing your own license scenario.

IntegrationRuntimeSsisCatalogInfo.description: Catalog information for managed dedicated integration runtime.

catalogAdminUserName.description: The administrator user name of catalog database.

catalogAdminPassword.description: The password of the administrator user account of the catalog database.

catalogPricingTier.description: The pricing tier for the catalog database. The valid values could be found in https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/details/sql-database/

typeProperties.description: Managed integration runtime status type properties.

ManagedIntegrationRuntimeStatusTypePrope.description: Managed integration runtime status type properties.

createTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime was created, in ISO8601 format.

nodes.description: The list of nodes for managed integration runtime.

otherErrors.description: The errors that occurred on this integration runtime.

lastOperation.description: The last operation result that occurred on this integration runtime.

ManagedIntegrationRuntimeOperationResult.description: Properties of managed integration runtime operation result.

type.description: The operation type. Could be start or stop.

startTime.description: The start time of the operation.

activityId.description: The activity id for the operation request.

nodeId.description: The managed integration runtime node id.

status.description: The managed integration runtime node status.

errors.description: The errors that occurred on this integration runtime node.

ManagedIntegrationRuntimeError.description: Error definition for managed integration runtime.

time.description: The time when the error occurred.

typeProperties.description: Self-hosted integration runtime status type properties.

SelfHostedIntegrationRuntimeStatusTypePr.description: Self-hosted integration runtime status type properties.

createTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime was created, in ISO8601 format.

taskQueueId.description: The task queue id of the integration runtime.

internalChannelEncryption.description: It is used to set the encryption mode for node-node communication channel (when more than 2 self-hosted integration runtime nodes exist).

nodes.description: The list of nodes for this integration runtime.

scheduledUpdateDate.description: The date at which the integration runtime will be scheduled to update, in ISO8601 format.

updateDelayOffset.description: The time in the date scheduled by service to update the integration runtime, e.g., PT03H is 3 hours

localTimeZoneOffset.description: The local time zone offset in hours.

capabilities.description: Object with additional information about integration runtime capabilities.

serviceUrls.description: The URLs for the services used in integration runtime backend service.

autoUpdate.description: Whether Self-hosted integration runtime auto update has been turned on.

versionStatus.description: Status of the integration runtime version.

IntegrationRuntimeAutoUpdate.description: The state of integration runtime auto update.

SelfHostedIntegrationRuntimeNode.description: Properties of Self-hosted integration runtime node.

nodeName.description: Name of the integration runtime node.

machineName.description: Machine name of the integration runtime node.

hostServiceUri.description: URI for the host machine of the integration runtime.

status.description: Status of the integration runtime node.

versionStatus.description: Status of the integration runtime node version.

version.description: Version of the integration runtime node.

registerTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime node was registered in ISO8601 format.

lastConnectTime.description: The most recent time at which the integration runtime was connected in ISO8601 format.

expiryTime.description: The time at which the integration runtime will expire in ISO8601 format.

lastStartTime.description: The time the node last started up.

lastStopTime.description: The integration runtime node last stop time.

lastUpdateResult.description: The result of the last integration runtime node update.

lastStartUpdateTime.description: The last time for the integration runtime node update start.

lastEndUpdateTime.description: The last time for the integration runtime node update end.

isActiveDispatcher.description: Indicates whether this node is the active dispatcher for integration runtime requests.

concurrentJobsLimit.description: Maximum concurrent jobs on the integration runtime node.

maxConcurrentJobs.description: The maximum concurrent jobs in this integration runtime.

nodeName.description: The name of the node to be removed.

IntegrationRuntimeConnectionInfo.description: Connection information for encrypting the on-premises data source credentials.

serviceToken.description: The token generated in service. Callers use this token to authenticate to integration runtime.

identityCertThumbprint.description: The integration runtime SSL certificate thumbprint. Click-Once application uses it to do server validation.

hostServiceUri.description: The on-premises integration runtime host URL.

publicKey.description: The public key for encrypting a credential when transferring the credential to the integration runtime.

isIdentityCertExprired.description: Whether the identity certificate is expired.

IntegrationRuntimeRegenerateKeyParameter.description: Parameters to regenerate the authentication key.

keyName.description: The name of the authentication key to regenerate.

authKey1.description: The primary integration runtime authentication key.

authKey2.description: The secondary integration runtime authentication key.

IntegrationRuntimeNodeMonitoringData.description: Monitoring data for integration runtime node.

nodeName.description: Name of the integration runtime node.

availableMemoryInMB.description: Available memory (MB) on the integration runtime node.

cpuUtilization.description: CPU percentage on the integration runtime node.

concurrentJobsLimit.description: Maximum concurrent jobs on the integration runtime node.

concurrentJobsRunning.description: The number of jobs currently running on the integration runtime node.

maxConcurrentJobs.description: The maximum concurrent jobs in this integration runtime.

sentBytes.description: Sent bytes on the integration runtime node.

receivedBytes.description: Received bytes on the integration runtime node.

IntegrationRuntimeNodeIpAddress.description: The IP address of self-hosted integration runtime node.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of self-hosted integration runtime node.
